modShortDescription: This 7DTD mod adds again the old Alpha 17 cultivation system that was removed in the Alpha 18.
modDescription:
This 7DTD mod adds again the old Alpha 17 cultivation system that was removed in the Alpha 18 introducing its Farm Plots, also enables the [hoe](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/), its recipe and its schema to unlock it, [farm](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-farming/) plots and fertile farmland work without any problem, you decide how to grow.

**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/4kaiuggwx1goiib/GK_Return_to_Old_Farmland_A19.rar/file)** for A19  
**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/sbcv9n974ckm3ug/GK_Return_to_Old_Farmland.rar/file)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20168-gouki%C2%B4s-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Gouki](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/gouki/)
